name: FinV2
description:
I made this odd (slightly dark?) little project after a friend suggested that Mondriaan paintings would be a nice background for a game level. It is essentially finished, (though not too thoroughly tested). It’s a kind of escape room game, but there’s no UI so you just have to fend for yourself, which can make escaping the rooms a little surreal, and the mouse controller needs some adjustment, I have an idea to some time in the future use a game like this (or extension of this game) to showcase current artists’ work within an escape room context. And if you see the word FIN appear? That’s the end 

All sounds from freesound.org

All assets from Unity Asset Store
